summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingThe Exuviance AGE REVERSE+ Toning Neck Cream is an advanced neck cream that helps target the telltale signs of aging and tech-neck to restore a smoother, tighter look to the neck and d√©colletage area. Featuring breakthrough MicroDiPeptide229 technology.
details: DetailsBenefitsTargets uneven texture, surface discoloration and neck creasesReveals a tighter, more lifted lookHydrates and renews for healtiher looking skin on the neck and d√©colletageFeaturesFragrance-freeTargets 5 key components of skin's matrix, including collagen, hyaluronic acid and elastin to provide a lifted and sculpted appearanceGently exfoliates to promote skin's natural turnover process, while also fading the appearance of discolorationKey IngredientsMicroDiPeptide229NeoGlucosamineCitrafillBakuchiolVitamin EItem 2627656How To UseGently smooth over neck and d√©colletage twice daily.For external use only. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If rash or irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If sw allowed, seek medical assistance. This product contains Bakuchiol.**If you are pregnant or considering pregnancy, consult your physician.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Acetyl Glucosamine, Triethyl Citrate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, C10-18 Triglycerides, Butylene Glycol, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Behenyl Alchol, Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Ethoxydiglycol, Glyceryl Dilaurate, Bakuchiol, Acetyl Dipeptide-31 Amide, Palmitoyl Glyceryl, Tocopheryl Acetate, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract, Lecithin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Bisulfite, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Carbomer, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Steareth-10, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently smooth over neck and d√©colletage twice daily.For external use only. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If rash or irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If sw allowed, seek medical assistance. This product contains Bakuchiol.**If you are pregnant or considering pregnancy, consult your physician.
ingredients: Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract

reviews.headline: Best neck cream
reviews.comments: Love this neck cream. I noticed improvement of my neck within a week. A little goes a long way. I will maybe try other products by this line.

reviews.headline: Do not purchase
reviews.comments: This creme is a waste of money, I sed it for 3 mos and no change, waste of money

reviews.headline: As an older woman I'm a believer
reviews.comments:
Been using this product for quite some time, from my experience, this product has made my neck smooth and reduced the appearance of lines.  
I use it everyday after my shower at the gym. 
I love the scent and texture ofthe cream.  
This is my experience hope you have the same. üå∏

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments:
I was recommended this last year around Black Friday. I'd been looking & trying things for a few years.
This product is absolutely amazing. Improved skin texture. Crepeness decreased, as did fine lines as well as big lines. Dark lines have lightened by about 80%. I sleep on my side so I never thought I'd have this much improvement of the d√©collet√©.
It's better when I use it twice a day but I often forget. It's still 80% better. If I remember it's at least 90-95% better.

reviews.headline: Wasnt foR me
reviews.comments: Honestly not sure what to say here as I was excited to receive these products but I had a very very bad reaction to it. It dried my skin out and left a rash for over a week. Had to stop using it after 2 days. I have combo skin and no allergies

reviews.headline: Makes a smooth neck
reviews.comments: When I received this Complimentary product   in exchange for my honest review I was happy to try it out because I'm getting old 52 and my neck isn't the same so I gave it a try to see how it works. I was amazed on the results.  I will be buying this product and using it every day. It made my neck so soft and started seeing results right away. I recommend to try this.

reviews.headline: amazing neck cream
reviews.comments: I had tried this cream @ ulta I saw instant results. but it was   $$ But when ulta had 50% sale in jan decided to buy.i have no regrets.i just started using 3 days in I am seeing results already. it's not greasy it absorbs very well.a little goes along away.the box has a symbol thar is good for 12mths hopefully ulta has another sale.i will be posting piks

reviews.headline: No results yet
reviews.comments: Ive been using this for a few weeks and see no results yet. I feel my neck looks dry and crepe-y even after using. This is an expensive product so hopefully I'll see results woth continued use. But not impressed so far.

reviews.headline: Highly Recommend
reviews.comments: This cream is highly effective and provides a generous amount of product, making it a great value. It deeply moisturized my neck and noticeably improved its texture, leaving my skin feeling smoother and more supple. I was impressed with how quickly it absorbed‚Äîthere was no greasy residue, just a soft, hydrated finish. Overall, it works exceptionally well and delivers visible results.

reviews.headline: Effective, quick absorbtion, and non-greasy
reviews.comments: This really moisturized my neck and changed the texture too. I'm pleased with the effectiveness and the fact that it's absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy mess.

reviews.headline: Firming, Smooth, and Luxurious
reviews.comments: The Exuviance Advanced Toning Neck Cream is highly effective, visibly firming and smoothing the skin on the neck and d√©colletage. The scent is subtle and pleasant, not overpowering. Its texture is rich yet lightweight, providing smooth, even application. The cream absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue. The packaging is elegant and practical, with a user-friendly dispenser for easy use.

reviews.headline: Nice product
reviews.comments: I love the light scent of this product as someone who is often overwhelmed by scents. It absorbed into my skin really fast and did not leave a greasy feeling after being applied. The texture of the skin has greatly improved and I am looking forward to using more of these products in the future!

reviews.headline: Great moisturization!
reviews.comments: I have been using the Exuviance Advanced Toning Neck Cream for a little over two weeks and I really like it. This cream is gentle on your neck yet powerful on wrinkles. It helps target the telltale signs of aging, such as horizontal creasing, wrinkles, sagging skin, and discoloration. It contains breakthrough MicroDiPeptide229¬Æ technology ‚Äì a patented micro-sized lifting and firming peptide technology that allows for optimal delivery into skin's surface. Since I turned 50 this year I really needed this cream and I am hoping to see more great results the longer I use it. I would recommend this neck cream. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Rich, effective moisturizer. Deal breaker ingredients.
reviews.comments:
This was my favorite product from the Exuviance campaign! I love how moisturizing it is and the fact that it contains bakuchiol instead of retinol. Sometimes I even used it on my face when I was in need of more intense hydration, but because of the thick formula, it would clog my pores, so I couldn't use it every day. When used as intended on my neck and d√©collet√©, I had no issues. However, product contains phenoxyethanol, which makes so I wouldn't recommend it.
I recieved this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Has the product changed?
reviews.comments: I have used this product for years and with great results. I recently ordered a few jars from Ulta when it was on sale. I opened one of the jars and as soon as I opened it, it looked like the cream was much different and had a light sent. Upon applying it on my neck I noticed it left a white cast on my skin. It eventually fades away, but this wasn't the case before. Not sure how I feel about keeping the two other jars.

reviews.headline: best product ever!!!
reviews.comments: I am in love woth this product. I love the creamy texture amd how it does have any fragrance. I also love how I can use it in my arms and legs as well.

reviews.headline: Perfect for more than just your neck
reviews.comments: This is not something I would think to purchase. But with it being such a heavy cream and a large container. This is perfect for mixing with body lotion/oil to give your body where it needs it some extra toning benefits.

reviews.headline: Hydrating with a light scent
reviews.comments: This cream is so thick and creamy, I love the way it hydrates my neck and d√©collet√©. The tub it comes in is large, so you're getting a lot of product. A light scent makes it the perfect final touch to my night time routine. It also gives a slight glow if applied during the day.

reviews.headline: Formula has changes
reviews.comments: I purchase this neck cream last year and waited for the sale. It's not the same formula from the first time I purchased it.  It's like it's too thick. Cheap plastic jar. Not impressed at all.

reviews.headline: Younger looking neck
reviews.comments: After using this product, my neck has never felt more toned and firm. My skin is in excellent condition and I look five years younger. I would recommend it to anyone with loose skin!!! I wrote this honest review in exchange for a free gifted product.

faceoff_positive.comments: As I am approaching my 40 in just a short few years, I've been trying to focus on maintaining my skin and always looking for improvements. Unfortunately, the environment, how I sleep, and all the stress factors affect our skin. I've focused on nutrition, hydration, and exercise but sometimes it's not enough. However, when it comes to my skincare I am very particular about what I use as sometimes it has the opposite effect (especially not so expensive creams). While I've never heard of Exuviance before I did my research and decided to give it a try! I truly believe your neckline shows your age and I've had concerns with some of the lines but I also know I need to do better on moisturization when it comes to my neck. I gave this Exuviance age reverse toning neck cream a try and it's nothing like I've tried before. The cream is thicker but super easy to apply. Not oily and very moisturizing! I love how light it feels and I can go on about my day with it. Some days I chose not to wear makeup and others this works great for under the make up. I do have combination skin and it worked well for me! I love the scent of this cream, it's very gentle and pleasant. It absorbs into my skin very quickly and leaves my neck feeling moisturized and soft. The jar is huge and a little goes a long way. Unlike another neck cream I've been using this past year, I believe this will last much longer for me. So far I have noticed it has helped my neckline to be moisturized, smoother, and soft. Just like any products I believe overtime the results will be more and more visible. I am happy with what I am seeing so far! Based on the results so far, I truly believe once I ran out I will be purchasing more. I am quite impressed and as someone who is very picky on the skincare products I say this is a must have! On the side note, one way I would improve this product is to add spf to protect our neck from all the sun exposure we get daily (especially living in Texas!). I would recommend this product! * I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. *
faceoff_positive.headline: Much needed for my neck lines!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I received this product for free from Exuviance in exchange for my honest review. 
I have been testing Exuviance AGE REVERSE+ Toning Neck Cream for about a month and I have mixed feelings. The positives first: giant tub, which feels luxurious. It opens well and looks nice. My skin feels soft, so the moisturizing aspect is working. It's thick and creamy and has staying power. But on the flip side of that, it's really greasy. I feel like my sheets need to be washed every night and I have to be careful with my shirts in the morning. The smell is not pleasant. It's supposed to be fragrance-free, but it's got a light chemical smell, maybe? It's not strong and it doesn't stick around that I've noticed, but it's not a smell you want associated with you. I'm not certain that it's doing anything for the lines in my neck, either. It's been about a month and maybe I need to give it more time? Overall, it seems expensive for a neck moisturizer, but I'll give it another couple months and maybe I'll see better results.
faceoff_negative.headline: Moisturizing but smelly and no wrinkle reduction
